00012 #include "GeneralSettingsPage.h"
00013 
00014 #include <QVBoxLayout>
00015 #include <QDir>
00016 #include <QPushButton>
00017 #include <QFileDialog>
00018 #include <QLabel>
00019 #include <QCoreApplication>
00020 #include <QMessageBox>
00021 
00022 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00023 // Function: GeneralSettingsPage()
00024 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 GeneralSettingsPage::GeneralSettingsPage(QSettings& settings) : settings_(settings),
00026                                                                 directoryEdit_(0),
00027                                                                 usernameEdit_(0)
00028 {
00029     // Create the directory line edit and label.
00030     QLabel *directoryLabel = new QLabel(tr("Default directory:"), this);
00031 
00032     QString defaultDir = settings_.value("general/defaultDir", QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()).toString();
00033     directoryEdit_ = new QLineEdit(defaultDir, this);
00034     connect(directoryEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(QString const&)), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00035 
00036     QPushButton* pathButton = new QPushButton("Browse...", this);
00037     connect(pathButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(selectDirectory()));
00038     QHBoxLayout *pathLayout = new QHBoxLayout;
00039     pathLayout->addWidget(directoryEdit_, 1);
00040     pathLayout->addWidget(pathButton);
00041 
00042     // Create the username line edit and label.
00043     QLabel* usernameLabel = new QLabel(tr("User name:"), this);
00044 
00045     QString username = settings_.value("general/username", getenv("USERNAME")).toString();
00046     usernameEdit_ = new QLineEdit(username, this);
00047 
00048     // Setup the layout.
00049     QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00050     layout->addWidget(usernameLabel);
00051     layout->addWidget(usernameEdit_);
00052     layout->addSpacing(12);
00053     layout->addWidget(directoryLabel);
00054     layout->addLayout(pathLayout);
00055     layout->addStretch(1);
00056 }
00057 
00058 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 // Function: ~GeneralSettingsPage()
00060 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 GeneralSettingsPage::~GeneralSettingsPage()
00062 {
00063 }
00064 
00065 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00066 // Function: selectDirectory()
00067 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00068 void GeneralSettingsPage::selectDirectory()
00069 {
00070     QString dir = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, tr("Select Directory"),
00071                                                     directoryEdit_->text());
00072 
00073     if (!dir.isEmpty())
00074     {
00075         directoryEdit_->setText(dir);
00076     }
00077 }
00078 
00079 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 // Function: validate()
00081 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 bool GeneralSettingsPage::validate()
00083 {
00084     Q_ASSERT(prevalidate());
00085 
00086     // Check for a valid username.
00087     if (usernameEdit_->text().isEmpty())
00088     {
00089         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Warning, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00090                            tr("The user name must be set."), QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00091         msgBox.exec();
00092         return false;
00093     }
00094 
00095     // Check if the directory does not exist.
00096     if (directoryEdit_->text().isEmpty() || !QDir(directoryEdit_->text()).exists())
00097     {
00098         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Warning, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00099                            tr("The specified path for the default directory is invalid. "
00100                               "Please enter a valid path."), QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00101         msgBox.exec();
00102         return false;
00103     }
00104 
00105     return true;
00106 }
00107 
00108 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00109 // Function: apply()
00110 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00111 void GeneralSettingsPage::apply()
00112 {
00113     // Save the settings.
00114     settings_.setValue("general/defaultDir", directoryEdit_->text());
00115     settings_.setValue("general/username", usernameEdit_->text());
00116 }
00117 
00118 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00119 // Function: onPageChange()
00120 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00121 bool GeneralSettingsPage::onPageChange()
00122 {
00123     // Do not change the page if the settings are invalid.
00124     if (!validate())
00125     {
00126         return false;
00127     }
00128 
00129     // If they are valid, save them and allow the page to be changed.
00130     apply();
00131     return true;
00132 }
